data.name: Hackshot Demo
data.detailed_description:
HackShot is a puzzle game with a mix of physics, logic, and crafting. Analyze the environment, craft your solution, and hack the system!
Immerse yourself into open-ended puzzles where you breach security, destroy viruses, and battle black hats.

About The Demo

This demo covers the first 11 Levels of the game, which is about 5% of the full game, and goes through the main mechanic of modding Cyberballs and the various types of mods
